Dispose()

Releases resources used by the loader and unregisters it from the navigation system.

Declaration
public void Dispose()
| Edit this page View Source

LoadNavigationAsync(object, string, CancellationToken)

Queues a request to load the specified navigation property for an entity. Multiple requests for the same navigation are batched together and executed in a single database query to reduce round trips.

Declaration
public Task<List<object>> LoadNavigationAsync(object entity, string propertyName, CancellationToken ct = default)
Parameters
Type Name Description
object entity

The entity instance whose navigation should be loaded.
string propertyName

Name of the navigation property to load.
CancellationToken ct

Token used to cancel the asynchronous operation.
Returns
Type Description
Task<List<object>>

A list of related entities once the batch has been processed.
